title: Detectives Release Video and Photos of Person of Interest in Landover Homicide
body:
On
July 18, at approximately 11:00 am, patrol officers responded to
the 2400 block of Kent Village Place for a shooting. The victim was located outside suffering from
multiple gunshot wounds and was pronounced dead on the scene.Anyone with information on the man in these images is urged to call the Homicide Unit at 301-516-2512. Callers wishing
to remain anonymous may call Crime Solvers at 1-866-411-TIPS (8477), or go
online at www.pgcrimesolvers.com, or use the “P3 Tips” mobile app
(search “P3 Tips” in the Apple Store or Google Play to download the app onto
your mobile device.) Please refer to case number 20-0034035.Pedimos que quien tenga información sobre
este caso por favor llame a la Unidad de Homicidios al 301-516-2512. Quienes
deseen permanecer anónimos pueden llamar a Crime Solvers al 1-866-411-TIPS
(8477), o ir en línea a www.pgcrimesolvers.com
Posted by


Prince George's County Police


at
